bio:treatment.description: Leaf blades 2.5–10 cm, faces minutely strigoso-hirsutulous to villoso-hirsute and stipitate-glandular (hairs ca. 0.1 mm). Peduncles 2–22 cm. Paleae ca. 4 mm. Ray corollas 6–17 mm, laminae broadly elliptic, apices 3-toothed. Disc corollas 2.5–2.7 mm. Cypselae 3–4.5 × 2–2.5 mm.
